question:
Which among the following was/ were the objectives of Deoband Movement?
1. Spreading the teachings of the Quran among Muslims
2. Jihad against the Foreign powers
3. Welfare of Muslims
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: In the year 1886, Deoband movement was started in Saharanpur district of United Province.. Its main objectives are spreading the teachings of Quran among Muslims and jihad (Fight against the enemies of Islam) against the Foreign powers.
